data.communities: For now please e-mail the author, mailing list is an option.
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Text::Ngram is an efficient XP implementation of character-level
    n-grams.

    This module (Text::Ngrams) is likely less efficient, but it
    provides additional flexibility: It has built-in mode for processing
    in character, word, and byte (raw character) mode. It also provides
    a user with an option of easily defining other modes of operation
    using regular expressions and parameter functions.
